safety_flags.evidence: The post questions the authenticity of users claiming to be part of the '/ng/' community, potentially creating pressure to conform to perceived community standards.
safety_flags.benign_explanation: The user may simply be curious about the level of engagement or expertise within the online community.

safety_flags.evidence: The question 'Is anyone on here even a real NG?' can be interpreted as an attempt to define and police the boundaries of the '/ng/' community.
safety_flags.benign_explanation: The user might be trying to initiate a discussion about what it means to be a genuine member of the '/ng/' community.

localization.suggested_vibe: Internet forum, potentially associated with online subcultures.
